FISSION.description: Explosions from your Exploding ID are twice as big and twice as strong.

EXPLOSIVE_IMPACT.description: Exploding gives an additional chance to deal [neutral]300% Main Attack damage in a radius of 5 blocks upon killing an enemy.

MAGNET.description: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you.

PLAGUE.description: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs.

HAWKEYE.description: Arrow Hurricane becomes a condensed stream of 25 arrows, dealing [neutral]33%, [thunder]4%, and [air]4% each.

GREED.description: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health.

CAVALRYMAN.description: You may cast spells and attack with a -30% damage penalty while on a horse.

GUARDIAN.description: 35% of damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you.

HERO.description: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 15% bonus damage and defence.

ALTRUISM.description: Nearby players gain 100% of the health you gain from Health Regen and Life Steal.

ARCANES.description: 25% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted.

ROVINGASSASSIN.description: Vanish will no longer block mana and health regeneration.

MADNESS.description: Casts a random spell of your class every 3 seconds.

LIGHTWEIGHT.description: You no longer take fall damage.

SORCERY.description: 25% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost.

RALLY.description: Cleansing Breeze heals you for 15% and allies for 20%, but Charge becomes harmless.

CHERRY_BOMBS.description: Turns Smoke Bomb into firecrackers that fly farther, tighter, and deal [neutral]100%, [earth]30%, [fire]30%, and [air]30% instantly.

FREERUNNER.description: When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%.

PEACEFUL_EFFIGY.description: Your Totem will last twice as long.

FURIOUS_EFFIGY.description: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved.

GRAVITYWELL.description: Meteor has increased blast radius and pulls enemies instead.

DESC_SNOWYSTEPS.description: Leaves a trail of snow behind you.

GEOCENTRISM.description: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time.

TEMBLOR.description: Bash gains +1 Area of Effect and is 0.05s faster.

RECKLESS_ABANDON.description: Sacrifice War Scream's defense bonus to give Tempest [earth]+5%, [fire]+15%, [air]5% and 3 extra hits.

ALTEREGO.description: Awakened can be activated after saving 40% less mana, but its duration is reduced by 25%.

FOREST_BLESSING.description: Your hound gains increased movement speed, attack speed, vision, and [neutral]+60%. Arrow Bomb's damage is reduced by [neutral] -30%.

SOUL_EATER.description: Devour and Harvester grant double mana. Decreases maximum marks by 1.

STRINGS_OF_FATE.description: Your puppets have a lifetime of 3 seconds and deal double damage with attacks and explosions.

ESCAPE_ROUTE.description: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast but also decay twice as fast.

DIVINE_HONOR.description: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals [earth]-15% per hit.

GENTLE_GLOW.description: Orphion's Pulse restores up to 25% more max health to allies, but heals at a slower rate. Fluid Healing's effectiveness is increased by 150%.

PERFECT_RECALL.description: Memory Recollection speeds up Chaos Explosion by 0.1s per spell but increases Chaos Explosion's mana bank requirement by 30.

JUGGLE.description: Mutilate adds an additional 12 hits. All hits are reduced by [neutral]-10%.

GRUESOME_KNOTS.description: Bleeding and Twisted Tether deal double damage, but Bleeding duration is reduced.

COAGULATE.description: Blood Connection and Eldritch Call's teleports launch you further and higher.

DEADWEIGHT.description: Totem's horizontal velocity is greatly increased at the cost of vertical movement.

EXPUNGE.description: When using Heal, cast one instant pulse that heals 15% of your max health.

LUNGE.description: Hop and Leap's horizontal velocity is greatly increased.

WINDSURF.description: Righting Reflex has 75% reduced fall speed, lasts twice as long, and is affected stronger by movement speed.

HELLFIRE.description: Bash is replaced by a single hit, gaining +3 radius and dealing [neutral]+85%, [earth]+10%, and [fire]+60%. Boiling Blood's cooldown is set to 2s, gains [neutral]+40%, [fire]+50%, and burns twice as fast for 1s, but can't slow.

NAPALM.description: Fire Creep increases Arrow Bomb damage by [fire]+15%, but deals 15 times the self-damage and lowers velocity. Scorched Earth radius is increased and deals [neutral]+65%.

TWISTING_THREADS.description: Tangled Traps ropes gain +1 range, can overlap up to 3 times, and deal [neutral]50%. Gain +12 traps with 66% duration that cannot be triggered by enemies.

LIFESTREAM.description: Blood Sorrow deals [neutral]450% and grants 4 times the overhealth, but shortens its duration by 75%.

FIXATE.description: Devitalize doubles your Winded cap, but lowers Winded damage effects by 30%. Timelock absorbs up to 120 Winded.

INSOLUBLE.description: Dissolution now lasts 2.5 seconds, but grants only 35% resistance.

EFFLORESCENCE.description:
Jasmine Bloom deals [neutral]25% and 
[earth][thunder][water][fire][air]25% at the cost of 6 blocks of vertical range. 
Swan Dive deals [neutral]16% and [earth][thunder][water][fire][air]16%.

FIND_THYSELF.description: Masquerade now grants 75 Mana after switching between Masks 3 times.

METEOR_CRASH.description: Burning Sigil gains +6 radius and deals double the damage, but lasts half as long.

PERILOUS_FLARE.description: Pyrokinesis moves much slower, but has an increased Area of Effect and [neutral] +50%.

TOTEMIC_FUSE.description: Totemic Smash deals [neutral]+40%, [earth]+90%, [thunder]+90%, and [fire]+60% at the cost of half of Totem's duration.

SUBLIMATION.description: Totemic Shatter heals 75% of Regeneration's usual amount at the cost of 2 blocks of radius.

HURRICANES_EYE.description: Violent Vortex applies 2 marks to every enemy it hits.

FALLOUT.description: Bomb Arrow gains +7.5 range, [fire]+50%, severely increased recoil, and [neutral]25% self-damage.

SEEKING_MODULE.description: Homing Shots track towards nearby enemies much more aggressively.

PARAGON.description: Shield Strike deals [neutral]600% damage. Mantle of the Bovemist's cooldown is reduced by 15s, but is limited to one shield charge.

LUSTRATE.description: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Searing Light deals [water]+150%.

ROCK_SHIELD.description: Arrow Shield's defense is increased by 10%, but its number of charges is reduced by 1.

LAST_RESORT.description: Bloodlust has doubled corrupted scaling and knockback, but deals [neutral]-100% [fire]-60%.

LOCKDOWN.description: Meteor will snap onto a target in range, regardless of aim.

RUSTED_ICHOR.description: Boiling Blood cooldown is reduced by 0.5s and inflicts 40% slowness, but deals no damage.

FRENETIC_SPIRIT.description: Guardian Angels damage is set to 10%, but shoot 40% faster and last 5 times longer. Frenzy's cap is increased by 55.

DISPLACE.description: Wind Slash deals massive knockback to enemies hit by Teleport.

TACKLE.description: Flying Kick deals much more knockback and increases Collide damage by an additional [neutral]150%, [thunder]60%, and [fire]10%.

FLURRY_OF_BLOWS.description: Turn Double Slice into a 10-hit pummeling of 16% damage per hit.

EVERSHOT.description: Arrow Hurricane becomes a consistent, straight stream of arrows with a slower fire rate, dealing greater knockback and triple damage per arrow.

POWER_FIST.description: Striking enemies with an empty hand greatly knocks them back.

VEDETTE.description: Focus gets +10% damage per stack, but caps at 2. Crepuscular Ray can be cast at 2 Focus with decreased Focus drain, launching you into the air and immobilizing you.

HEAT_SHIMMER.description: Foul Play will no longer slay a Mirror Clone and will still provide its effects, but Mirror Clone count is reduced to 1. Tricks application is increased by 50%.

VITRIOL.description: Uncontainable Corruption decreases Corrupted duration by 75% and gives drastically more damage, but disables Enraged Blow. Massacre adds 5 times as much corruption.

FAUSTIAN_GAMBIT.description: Frog Dance triggers once with increased vertical velocity and knockback, and deals [thunder]+400%.

METHODICAL.description: Initiator's reset time is reduced by 75%. Arrow Bomb area damage is halved, but direct hit damage is doubled.

PUNISHMENT.description: Reflected damage blinds enemies for 1s and makes them 10% more vulnerable to attacks for 3s.

ERGOSPHERE.description: Storm Dance instead lets your Totems pull enemies within their radius. Totem duration is decreased.

INVERSION.description: Teleport will grant you 3 seconds of levitation.

WORMHOLE.description: Last Laugh instead casts Meteor. Malicious Mockery causes Meteor to apply 13 Trick stacks.

PIONEERS_ECHO.description: Phantom Ray deals two bursts of [neutral] 150%, [water] 60% over 1 second. Decimator's increase and cap are raised to 140%.

DAUNTLESS_INFERNO.description: Courage casts a series of 5 infernos that expand after the last, dealing [fire]125% each, and grants 20% resistance instead of a damage boost.

SUPERCONDUCTOR.description: Chain Lightning channels three massive lightning bolts through you, arcing to enemies within 8 blocks for [thunder]225% and stunning them for 1s. You take 10% more damage for 4s.

SCARCE_COMFORT.description: Freestream Flow becomes slightly stronger and lasts indefinitely.

BRACHIATE.description: Grappling Hook has 25% increased range and increased velocity.

PHOENIXBORN.description: Health Regeneration is increased by 0.75% for every 1% Health missing.

SUN_EATER.description: Failing to backstab an enemy from behind blinds them for 0.5s and slows them by 20% for 5s.

SELFSUFFICIENT.description: Powder Specials can no longer be charged manually, but accumulate 8% charge every second.

ORBITAL_CHAIN.description: Chain Lightning hits slower, rebounds, adds 6 chains, and pulls mobs closer for a [neutral]1500% explosion spell.

CANNULATE.description: Sacrificial Shrine costs -5 Blood Pool to cast and health drain is halved.

INTANGIBLE.description: The knockback you take is drastically reduced, and reflected damage deals large knockback.

EARTHEN_SPLINTER.description: Quake channels nature energy into a powerful root, travelling underground and emerging under the nearest mob for [neutral]1200%

TROLL_BARGE.description:
Quake allows you to charge forth, dealing [neutral]80% and 
[earth]20% to any mobs hit, and ending with a powerful stomp for [neutral]400% and 
[earth]150%. This will leave you vulnerable.

COMBO_STOMP.description: Landing directly on an enemy with Fierce Stomp sends you back into the air and resets Escape.

TIDAL_DRIFT.description:
Flying Kick will instead send
you forwards.
This effect is limited to once per Charge cast.

SPACE_GLIDE.description: Lacerate performs a single horizontal jump and slash, dealing [neutral]400%.

REALITY_REVISION.description: Phasing Beam instead makes Twain's Arc explode upon hitting an enemy, dealing its damage in a 5 block radius. Twain's Arc now has extreme recoil.

WORMHOLE_2.description: Teleport will grant you 3 seconds of levitation.

FAN_THE_HAMMER.description: Arrow Storm becomes a single stream of 6 high-powered arrows that deal [neutral]90% and [thunder]35%.

HEARTBEAT.description:
Arrow Shield is locked to 2 charges but deals doubled damage.
Arrow Wall instead triples Arrow Shield damage and doubles Guardian Angels ammo.

SPECTRAL_MEMORY.description: Ghostly Trigger lasts until landing, but no longer increases attack speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 33%.
